dict.acceptation: 忘记，忘却；忽略，疏忽；遗落；忘掉；

sent.orig: Where is OK brainwashing, let me forget joy, forget pain, forget oneself?
sent.trans: 什么地方可以洗脑，让我忘记快乐，忘记伤痛，忘记自己？

sent.orig: No, not even close. Forget Vail, forget seeing my family, forget shoop, shoop, shoop.
sent.trans: 没有，都关门了。忘掉韦尔吧，忘掉家庭团聚吧，忘掉“咻，咻，咻。”吧。

sent.orig: Forget dinner, forget work, forget sleep.
Forget age, forget past, forget kind and enmity.
sent.trans: 忘记年龄，忘记过去，忘记恩怨。

sent.orig: We need to learn and forget. Forget the old and useless stuff.
sent.trans: 我们需要学习和忘记。忘记那些旧的和无用的东西。
